channel.title: Knife on Robin Wang

item.title: Subnautica Survival Knife
item.description: This is 1:1 replica of the iconic survival knife from the game subnautica. Table of Contents Overview Inspiration In Game Reference CAD Prototyping Blade Fabrication Laser Cutting Electro Etching Edge Grinding Vacuum Furanace Heat Treating DIY Hardening Professional Hardening Chemical Laser Etching Sharpening Handle Fabrication 3D Printing Resin Casting Final Assembly Packaging Cost/Stats Material Costs Tools Costs Service Fees Revenue Profit(?) Conclusion Overview This was my first project into blade smithing and low volume mass production, as well as my first attempt at selling a product.
